message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something more reasonable. This is a decent offer, take it while it's still good.
I'll compromise a bit, but I still think I deserve more
The money is shrinking Alice! Let's be realistic and split it closer to even this time.
I'll give in a bit more, but don't think I'll go much lower
Alice, we're running out of time! This offer is the best you'll get at this point. Take it before it shrinks even more.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, this is my final compromise
